price: Ewe Nabii! Pambana na makafiri na wanaafiki, na kuwa mgumu kwao! Na makaazi yao ni Jahannamu. Na hayo ni marejeo mabaya.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Pambana kwa Jihadi na hao walio tangaza ukafiri wao, na wanaafiki walio uficha ukafiri wao, kwa kila unacho kimiliki, nguvu na hoja. Na kuwa mkali juu ya makundi yote mawili hayo katika Jihadi yako. Na makaazi ya hao ni Jahannamu. Na marejeo maovu ni hayo marejeo yao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu jāhidi al-kufāra wal-munāfiqīna wa-ugh'luẓ ʿalayhim wamawāhum jahannamu wabi'sa al-maṣīru
